Our Projects

Programming is a superpower. The scratch programming language introduces programming concepts to young people in a fun and interactive way.

At Linux Talks, we offer tips, tutorials and project ideas in order to maximize on your Linux Usage Experience

There's no better way to meet Linux than to do it at a linux installment party.

Every 6 months we hold a hackathon to highlight the best of developer talent

    3.
